page.title: 17EDALE PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: Councillors are 5 residents of the village elected by the other villagers The term of office lasts for 4 years. They may be re-elected for another term.Present councillors_ { {Mr.R.Townsend (Chairman), Mr.A.Atkin, {Mrs.P.Cooper,Mr.C.Gilbert,Mr.D.Sowerby {Mrs.M.Tym.(Clerk).}The Chairman is elected annually by the councillors meetings are on the 3rd Wednesday of every month.The Parish Council can deal with any subject trivial or serious which affects the village.All matters arising are discussed at each meeting and any action can only be taken by the unanimous decision of the councillors . Contributed by Councillor Mrs.P.Cooper
